projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: You are currently navigating through this portfolio—A one-page, clean code, responsive website developed using only HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

projects.title: PhotonBreak
projects.description:
PhotonBreak is a 2D arcade game in which you guide a photon forward using gravity, by creating different celestial bodies such as black holes.
Available on App Store and Play Store by 2025

projects.title: BetChess
projects.description:
BetChess is an online Chess website with a particularity: each turn, you bet on your opponent's next move. If you predict correctly, you get to play twice! 
    (DISCLAIMER: the hosting server for this project is currently a free plan, and can take some time to load)

projects.title: Water Paths
projects.description:
Water Paths is my debut Unity project—a 2D puzzle game centered on water physics. 
Players must strategically move bricks to guide water and its different states, with a quiet story and light dialogues underscoring the gameplay.

projects.title: Simple Particle Interactions
projects.description: This particle simulation showcases algorithms' potential as an art form. A dance of colors and physics, where simple rules of attraction and inertia create mesmerizing patterns, showcasing the beauty of complex systems emerging from basic interactions.
